1: וַֽיְהִי֙ <sup>1961 </sup> <n>came</n> בַּיָּמִ֣ים <sup>3117 </sup> <n>And it came to pass in those days</n> הָהֵ֔ם <sup>1992 </sup> <n>those</n> וַיִּקְבְּצ֨וּ <sup>6908 </sup> <n>together</n> פְלִשְׁתִּ֤ים <sup>6430 </sup> <n>that the Philistines</n> אֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> מַֽחֲנֵיהֶם֙ <sup>4264 </sup> <n>their armies</n> לַצָּבָ֔א <sup>6635 </sup> <n>for warfare</n> לְהִלָּחֵ֖ם <sup>3898 </sup> <n>to fight</n> בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>with Israel</n> וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <sup>559 </sup> <n>said</n> אָכִישׁ֙ <sup>397 </sup> <n>And Achish</n> אֶל־ <sup>413 </sup> <n>to</n> דָּוִ֔ד <sup>1732 </sup> <n>unto David</n> יָדֹ֣עַ <sup>3045 </sup> <n>Know</n> תֵּדַ֗ע <sup>3045 </sup> <n>thou assuredly</n> כִּ֤י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>for</n> אִתִּי֙ <sup>854 </sup> <n>that</n> תֵּצֵ֣א <sup>3318 </sup> <n>that thou shalt go out</n> בַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <sup>4264 </sup> <n>with me to battle</n> אַתָּ֖ה <sup>859 </sup> <n>you</n> וַאֲנָשֶֽׁיךָ׃ <sup>376 </sup> <n>and your men</n>

3: וּשְׁמוּאֵ֣ל <sup>8050 </sup> <n>Now Samuel</n> מֵ֔ת <sup>4191 </sup> <n>was dead</n> וַיִּסְפְּדוּ־ <sup>5594 </sup> <n>had lamented</n> לוֹ֙ כָּל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>and all</n> יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <sup>3478 </sup> <n>and all Israel</n> וַיִּקְבְּרֻ֥הוּ <sup>6912 </sup> <n>him and buried</n> בָרָמָ֖ה <sup>7414 </sup> <n>him in Ramah</n> וּבְעִיר֑וֹ <sup>5892 </sup> <n>even in his own city</n> וְשָׁא֗וּל <sup>7586 </sup> <n>And Saul</n> הֵסִ֛יר <sup>5493 </sup> <n>had put away</n> הָאֹב֥וֹת <sup>178 </sup> <n>those that had familiar spirits</n> וְאֶת־ <sup>853 </sup> הַיִּדְּעֹנִ֖ים <sup>3049 </sup> <n>and the wizards</n> מֵהָאָֽרֶץ׃ <sup>776 </sup> <n>out of the land</n>
